title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.13 - Emergency and authority vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.13 - Emergency and authority vehicles

State Regulations

Upon the approach of any ambulance, police or fire department
vehicle, or upon the approach of the authority vehicles giving adequate warning
by means of siren or warning lights, all traffic shall proceed as near as
possible to the right hand curb on the roadway and stop, unless and until
otherwise directed by a bridge employee or until such vehicle or vehicles shall
have passed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
